Article/0-0-0-18/application-startup.html:
The server.js<\/strong>/client.js<\/strong> files at your application root are responsible for starting your application.<\/p>

When you run the application with npm start<\/code> the Nullstack.start<\/code> method in both files will start your main component and return the context<\/code><\/a> object of their respectives environments.<\/p>

The returned context<\/code> could be used normally, and you can set it's start<\/code> method which runs only once, being a good place for setting things up, as your database:<\/p> 

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> Application from<\/span> './src/Application'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> startDatabase from<\/span> './database'<\/span>;<\/span>

const<\/span> context =<\/span> Nullstack.<\/span>start<\/span>(<\/span>Application)<\/span>;<\/span>

context.<\/span>start<\/span> =<\/span> async<\/span> function<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
  context.<\/span>database =<\/span> await<\/span> startDatabase<\/span>(<\/span>context.<\/span>secrets)<\/span>;<\/span>
}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> context;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>



ðŸ’¡ The context.start<\/code> in server.js<\/strong> runs when the application is booted, and on client.js<\/strong> once the browser loads it<\/p>
<\/blockquote>

The context<\/code> can be updated in any way as long as it be exported on both files, when building the app Nullstack turns it into a serverless function out-of-box.<\/p>

Dependency startup pattern<\/a><\/h2>
A nice pattern to work with dependencies that require startup time configurations is to define a _start<\/code> function in the dependency:<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Dependency<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  static<\/span> async<\/span> _start<\/span>(<\/span>context<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    // start something with context<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Dependency;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> Application from<\/span> './src/Application'<\/span>;<\/span>
import<\/span> Dependency from<\/span> './src/Dependency'<\/span>;<\/span>

const<\/span> context =<\/span> Nullstack.<\/span>start<\/span>(<\/span>Application)<\/span>;<\/span>

context.<\/span>start<\/span> =<\/span> async<\/span> function<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
  await<\/span> Dependency.<\/span>_start<\/span>(<\/span>context)<\/span>;<\/span>
}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Application;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>
